r1.description: File name of first read in paired-end read sequencing assay, or only read for unpaired.

r2.description: File name of second read in paired-end read assay.

i1.description: A barcode index file. Often index off of first read.

i2.description: A barcode index file. Often index off of second read.

description: Information about how a sample was sequenced.

insdc_experiment.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) experiment accession. Accession must start with DRX, ERX, or SRX.

insdc_run.description: An INSDC (International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration) run accession. Accession must start with DRR, ERR, or SRR.

instrument_model.description: The model of the sequencer used. e.g. HiSeq 2000, Sequel.

instrument_platform.description: The sequencing platform used. e.g. Illumina, Ion Torrent, Pacific Biosciences.

library_construction.description: How the DNA sequencing library was prepared. e.g. Nextera XT, TrueSeq.

local_machine_name.description: Local name for the particular machine on which the sample was sequenced.

molecule.description: Specific type of molecule sequenced. e.g. total RNA, genomic DNA, polyA RNA.

paired_ends.description: Was a paired-end sequencing strategy used? Must be either yes or no.

umi_barcode.description: Information about unique molecular identifier (UMI) barcode sequences.

title: seq
